sentence.Network_en: It makes use of peculiar UV coating way to ensconce the color inside the lens.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是利用UV特殊涂料方式将镜片的颜色藏在镜片里面的方式生产的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 4. disassemble v. 解开, 分解, 拆卸5. ensconce v. 安顿下来, 安置, 隐藏6. undisclosed adj. 未泄露的, 保持秘密的, 身份不明的.
configuration n. 配置；结构；外形ensconce vt. 安置；安顿下来；使…隐藏Authorized Personnel Only 闲人免进

list.abs: We have ensconce ourselves in the most beautiful villa in the south of france ., 我们在法国南部最美丽的别墅里安顿下来.
Carmen finds her father ensconced with a new fiancee and family ;, 卡门发现她的爸爸已经有了一个新的未婚妻和家;
She ensconced herself in the closet in to eavesdrop., 她藏身于壁橱里 , 以便偷听.
He ensconced himself in the chair ., 他把自己安置在椅子上.
old man has ensconced himself in his favourite corner as usual., 老人已经像往常那样坐在他惬意的角落里了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the senses 'fortify' and 'shelter within or behind a fortification'; formerly also as insconce): from en-, in- 'in' + sconce

sentences.en: He ensconced himself in the armchair.
sentences.cn: 他安坐在有扶手的椅子上。

sentences.en: We have ensconce ourselves in the most beautiful villa in the south of france.
sentences.cn: 我们在法国南部最美丽的别墅里安顿下来。
